name: imgZine
tag_list: real-time, magazine, tablet, smartphone, publishing, ipad, iphone
description: platform for real time social magazines
overview:
imgZine has created a platform as a service for publishing real time social magazines (think: white-labeled Flipboard/Pulse/Zite) for mobile devices. Fast and effortless, using existing content, without the need for extra editors, IT and/or DTP.

Corporates and organizations face a mounting challenge when it comes to communicating with customers and employees. Your target groups are spending more and more time on mobile devices. They expect their company or organization to be on those platforms and provide information in real time.

You probably already have lots of relevant content to engage with customers and involve your employees. imgZine offers a simple and cost effective way to unlock this content for mobile devices like tablets and smartphones. Our solution requires no extra editorial effort, IT or design. imgZine helps to convert your internal and external communications from print issues to beautiful content experiences, made for both utility and reading pleasure. With our platform we help companies like MT Media Group, Rabobank and the Dutch IRS improve engagement with their customers and employees.

Our fully automated platform consists of content integration/aggregation functions, a content publishing platform and native (magazine) apps ensuring an optimal reading experience on mobile devices to maximize engagement with your audience, external (customers, subscribers, readers) or internal (employees). We analyze reading behavior to provide analytics information, trending topics and content recommendations.
